Key Match Events: Luka Doncic put Chicago Bulls forward Patrick Williams on a highlight reel with a viral moment.
Luka Doncic had a spectacular performance with 27 points, 13 assists, 7 rebounds, and 4 steals on 42% shooting from the field.
Chicago Bulls played without Zach LaVine and Lonzo Ball, which impacted their performance.
Post-Match Reflections: After the loss, the Chicago Bulls finished the night with a 3-5 record.
The team needs Zach LaVine as the schedule is getting much more difficult.
